captions.text: ...that a lot of people had been eagerly awaiting.
...my voice is a little bit tender today.
So I have to this in a more...
...somber, quiet, calm tone as opposed to...
...my normal, very shouty and bombastic self.
But either way, I am eagerly anticipating--
Was that just sitting there in that wheelchair?
I am exactly where I am...
...and I am who I am, but I dunno--
Wasn't there a Dr. Mercer in the... uh...
Why is there a mushroom sitting on that bed over there?
Ooo, I've found a lot of glowsticks.
How much deeper are we talking about here?
Can I carry up to a maximum--
Sooo, now we're going to sta-- okay, that's glowing.
Yeah, but WHY are they burning into my flesh?!
That is exactly what I'm trying to find out here, because...

...things seems to be a little bit odd,
if you know what I mean.
Anyway, so the game is procedurally generated up to a--
I'm trying to be a bit more easy on my voice...
Excuse me, I'm trying to be a little bit more tender...
...ooon my voice. What the hell is happening?
I may have to just give up...
...all anticipation on trying to be quiet...
...because I got my microphone set up...
...so if I scream it's gonna blow everything out.
I don't aim to scream and destroy all your eardrums.
So I gotta try to remain reserved.
Oh! What the...? Oh, that's paint on the ceiling.
I thought that was some arms dripping down.
But was there any point in coming in here?
Well, I'll just carry on my way then.
Hello creepy painting of a little girl.
Was that me screaming like a little girl?
"Once a small fishing ville in New Kipling--"
I'm gonna give up. I'm gonna go back to my normal--
I'm gonna go back to my normal stuff...
...because this is gonna get LOUD, I know it.
What was what? I didn't see any-- 'xcuse me!
I don't much care for this.
If you wanna stop being a douche any time...
This game gave me the heebie-jeebies...
...awfully early on into my playthrough here.
Why is there a dresser with a mirror on it?
Once again, I need to reiterate that I've never played...
...this game before, and-- oh, there's a brain...
Why is that spinning on there?
That's kinda weird. You don't have eyes or anything...
...so it's not really that bad, I guess.
Wanna run that by me again, douche?
You can't tell me there wasn't!
Oh, I got a flare. Can I get more flares?
Something bad's gonna happen to my butt.
Maybe I don't much appreciate all this stuff happening.
You get out of here with this noise!
You get outta here with this odd noise!
What- what do I- wait, there was something I could use...

Uh, a swirly mist someone left
after going to the bathroom!
Oh, there' s a thingy! I know there's a thingy!
Okay. COME ON, bring it on!
I'm just too... tough... for you.
God! You know, I was originally worried...
...that this would be a lot like Outlast...
...but this is actually a very different experience.
I mean besides the holding up of the thing--
No one sitting on the toilet tryin' to scare me?
All right! So-- oh, there is a tiny-- wait, what?
NO! I wasn't done with that!
Or maybe it just ran out... I don't know.
Oh, god! I thought that was something.
Those... those lights look like eye--
Watch... wash the poopdeck? Wash the lift deck?
I dunno what you're gonna get...
...but please don't let it be me!
Why am I in these bathrooms?!
What was that? What was that?!
God, I don't even know what I hear!
It's always interesting to have a new horror game...
...and you don't know what to expect.
...with most of the indie horror games that I've played...
...it's oftentimes that things get rather similar, so...
...it's good to have a fresh approach, I guess.
Okay, so... guess I'll go here. Did I not go over here?
No, I was all stopped up.
I'm a little bit lost. I can't--
Okay. Zoom in, zoom in, zoom in.
Okay, so it looks like there was actually...
...and open door over here on the right.
If we go over here... yeah, yeah, yeah-yeah-yeah, okay.
All right. Come on! Come on! Bring it on!
I'm sorry I'm relaxed a bit...
...they haven't actually thrown anything at me,...
Aaaaand now the music is climbing.
Wait a minute, were those three separate things?
Why the f-- Why the strings climbing up?
I don't want none of it! SHUT. UP.
I don't want... none... can I use it with-- thank you.
Uh, just sitting oddly in the middle of... nothing.
Oh, hi! What is that? Is that what I need?
Do I want or not want to touch that?
"There's gotta be a key." What are you talking about?
That's the sigil he was talking about,...
Don't say that! Why would you say that?! You're a moron!
Oh, what do we do? What do we do?
What do we do, I am s--
That's good. I like that. That was good.
There's gotta be a key, that's what she said.
There's gotta be a key somewhere.
There's gotta be another place I can open.
Oh, that's just a door frame.
Okay. All right. Come on! Come on, come on!
Wait, I have been here before!
Well, good. That always works better.
Okay, found a glowstick. I got glowsticks.
But not good for many other people.
The tats on my arm seem to be getting a bit strongeeer.
I don't wanna hear none of it.

I don't wanna open that door!
"What's that sound?"
Is this the key I need?
Oh, you don't do this to me!

Why do you sound so cheerful?
"I see you"
Oh my god, I went insane for a little bit!
I'm gonna assume that this is a key...
Oh, I can't move! I CAN'T MOVE!
Oh, I got stuck on a chair. I'm an idiot.
Aaall right! I got the key!
Can't beat me with my teddy bear!
Little Teddy--why do I keep throwing that...
Oh, wait a minute, I'm not done?
Oh, I thought I would have--
I guess that's what I need to do now because...
...there's no other reason why you would tell me that.
Oh, that's another clue of what I need to do, I guess!
I need to stack stuff to go over where I need to go.
Huhh. Can I get a little brief moment without notes?
The notes are... getting hard to read here.
I thought you said they didn't like fire!
'Kay, so I need to move it over there.
Oh, I see. Okay. I got it. I got it. Okay.
Stop humping the box and get over it!
Okey-dokey, that was really slow, but okay.
You need a bit more, uh... pep in your step...
...if we're gonna be surviving this apocalypse.
Okay, this box is over there.
Do I need to stack up to go over there?
Ooor I'm assuming I just need to go back.
Brech, brech, brech, breeech bech bech.
Okay, okay let go of the box.
Okay, so I can't move it this way, or what?!
Maybe I-- oh, maybe I just need to move it over here.
God, I have no idea what it wants me to do.
So, when am I gonna get outta here?
When am I ever gonna escape this heeeell?
So-- oh, I'm back in the beginning. Okay.
I got it. I got it. I got it.
This is where I go home...
Oh, there was another note back there, I think.
I'll read it. I've read every other one.
Oh, it's just a picture. Oh, okay.
Can you explain that to me?
How do I get out of this place?!
Oh, I gotta find more remnants?
Am I this... her... and she that they keep talking about?
I am the lady, aren't I?
Weren't you the guy that just said...
...about all the crap that's been going on?
I'm gonna assume that it's nothing...
...it's just been a whole lot of nothing.
So I'm not exactly worried about it...
...if it's a whole lot of nothing.
Are you a real something or are just gonna go away?
I got the power of the light!
You run away from the power of my flare.
I guess I gotta go up or down.
I know he said something about a boiler room...
Oh, I got my flare back? Cool.
...but what's the point of coming down here then?
Maybe he was just lying about t--what the hell?
Is that a footprint on the ceiling?
I mean, now I go upstairs...
...that's the only other way I can go, I guess.
I wanna see some big scares! Big scares!
It just been little piddly scares!
I thought that was a thing on the wall I could use.
AAAAH! TAKE MY F-- oh, you're gone.
Don't ask me how I'm saving my flare.
Things are getting a little weirder now.
Things are getting a little-- What is that?
Oh, it's a house in the woods.
There's a lot of room with nothing in 'em.
Or he's getting freaky with those nurses out in the dirt.
He gets so dirty, he needs to go and bath, huh?
I feel like I'm running in circles here!
Maybe you been all around in the dirt.
So much time, and finding nothing!
Flare. God, I got another flare. Good.
I can see plenty of things!
You're a whole lot of nothing!
God, I found a whole lot of nothing!
What am I supposed to fiiind?!
What am I supposed to FIND?!
I thought there was gonna be someone in that chair!
Why does that keep sounding like that?
And why does that sound keep following me?
This sounds-- this looks like it's something.
Oh, I need to find another remnant...
You're crazy for thinking I'm crazy!
I can't see-- I can see plenty of things Sarah!
Sarah, if you could just get off your ass...
Maybe we could get to where we need to go!
'Kay, now we found a locked door!
GOD, I just need one more remnant!
Son of bitches, stop messing with me!
I keep founding dead ends and nothingness!
I'm on my last glowstick guys.
If I don't find anything now...
Oh, no, wait, I can go this way.
I don't wanna go-- OH, REMNANT!
I am not gonna forgive you for that one!
Okay, I gotta go to the room.

Knife.
[It's a pair of scissors, you big, scared dumbo :)]
I got a place I need to go!
At least Sarah doesn't run out of sprint juice!
It's like Sarah's been running a bit in her time.
Eugh, get it, get it, get it, getitgetitgetit!
Let's just take a breather here.
Let's stop up for a second.
I think imma stop this episode here.
Th-the thing I like about this game...
...and... and a lot of people... you know... will...
...might.. may agree with me of disagree with me...
...it doesn't just constantly throws stuff at you.
Like that, be all these little things that were happening...
...I was like: "It's gonna turn into something big!"...

...because a-- with all my experience
with my indie games...
...and it's really cool to see that...
...actually be portrayed correctly in a game, so...
...I'm very excited to be playing this game.
And I'm not joking about that!
It can integrate with my Twitch...
...and that way it goes to the chat...
...of the Twitch channel, that I'm using...
...and you guys can mess with me!
There's specific commands that you can use...
...to mess with someone who's playing it live.
And I want you guys to have that experience...
...but I don't know if you want me to play...
...or do live streaming, and take highlights from that...
...and then put them on the channel later.
So I need your help on this one, guys.
I need you to help me decide what to do.
If you guys want me to do a live stream...
...which is kinda what I wanna do...
...leave a like down below to let me know...
...or write in the comments to tell me...
So, this is really up to YOU...
...'cause I could do just a normal series of this...
...on YouTube, but I rather get you guys involved with it.
...thank you all so much for watching!
...for more horror games that I've done...

Wow, mad respect to Mark. He literally "played" with the game. I was so 
scared, I couldn't talk right, think straight or continue it. Lol. I bought 
it on ps4, recorded around 7 parts of it and started it again, because, I 
felt like I got stuck by running out of flares and glowsticks. Being 
followed by the witch, or, ghost, with nothing it's not fun. I started it 
again, but, I did even less. I bitched out of the game. I never got the 
scissors. So, Markiplier, hats off to ya. I will never play that game 
again...alone at night with my headset on. ﻿

comments.text:
I'd actually like if you would do both. My bandwidth won't support live 
streaming. I've played this game myself, found a neat trick. if your phone 
starts flipping out, just walk backwards facing the wall. it won't do 
anything to you then. also, flares are downstairs in the second part. if at 
all possible, never leave the single side doors open. biiiiig no no JoJo. 
I'd love to see more of this though. Awesome game. I'd also love more I am 
bread. Sorry Mark, but you're funny as heck when you rage. Hate putting you 
through stress but.... I was laughing so hard I couldn't breathe when you 
did the second one. Please do more. And thank you if you do.﻿
